name: Stick N Throttle Aviation (Pty) Ltd
about: Stick n Throttle Aviation (Pty) Ltd is a premier flying school based in Cape Town, South Africa, offering professional flying training programs tailored to meet the diverse needs of aspiring pilots. We provide comprehensive training from Light Sport Aircraft (LSA) to Airline Transport Pilot License (ATPL), as well as specialized courses such as Night Rating and Instructor Rating. Our experienced instructors and modern fleet ensure a high standard of training, preparing students for successful careers in aviation. With a focus on safety, skill development, and personalized attention, Stick n Throttle Aviation is committed to helping you achieve your flying dreams. Join us to experience top-notch aviation training in one of the most scenic flying environments in the world.
services:
